post_title: For Sale all 4 T2o6 Cobbs - bat on, bat off, Red & Green Portraits
post_content:
The Green & Red Portraits were cracked out for the Binder Set. The Green also has a nice pronounced plate scratch running through the "Piedmont." I believe the Bat Off Old Mill would grade trimmed, also, there's a light/hard to see crease in the bat area. The Bat On is still graded sgc1.
Asking:
Green Portrait $ new price/post
Bat Off, Old Mill $ SOLD
Bat On, sgc1 $ new price/post
Red Portrait Tolstoi $ SOLD

Open to offers
Paypal FF - Ships bmwt/full value insurance
Thanks!
-Ryan
